40065000.English_Text: (I think I need to \narbitrate between <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>...)
40065000.Chinese_Text: （我想我需要在 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> 和 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> 之间\narbitrate ......）

40065001.English_Text: (It's like the two people's goal is deeper than I thought...)
40065001.Chinese_Text: （好像两个人的目标比我想象的要深得多……）

40065002.English_Text: (It's dangerous to patrol alone, so I'll have to help \n too)
40065002.Chinese_Text: （一个人巡逻很危险，我也得帮忙\n）

40065003.Original_Text: 도와주셔서 감사합니다, 소협!\n역시 소협은 수양의 뜻을\n이해해주시는군요!
40065003.English_Text: Thank you for your help, Sohyeop!

40065004.Original_Text: 큰 힘이 되었습니다 소협.\n대의를 아는 이의 무공이란\n그리도 강하고 빠른 것이군요.
40065004.English_Text: It has been a great help.

40065005.English_Text: (I can't see the two of them. I'll have to look into them a bit more)
40065005.Chinese_Text: （我看不到他们两个。我得再仔细看看他们）

40065006.English_Text: (Someone over there seems to be down...?)

40065008.Original_Text: 이 자가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>진림</>의 행방을\n알 것 같지는 않군요.\n다른 곳을 찾아보죠, 소협!
40065008.English_Text: I don't think this person \ntextColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jinlim</> knows whereabouts.\nLet's look elsewhere, Sohyup!
40065008.Chinese_Text: 我不认为这个人\ntextColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jinlim</> 知道下落。\n我们到别处看看吧，Sohyup！

40065009.Original_Text: (이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>수용소</>의 꼴은...\n차마 눈 뜨고 볼 수 없군)
40065009.English_Text: (The form of this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>camp</> is...\nI can't even keep my eyes open)
40065009.Chinese_Text: （这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>营地</>的形式是......\n我什至无法睁开眼睛）

40065010.Original_Text: (이 사람도 다른 사람을\n살펴 볼 여유는\n없었을 듯 해)
40065010.English_Text: (It seems that this person didn't have the time to look at others.)
40065010.Chinese_Text: （看来这个人根本没时间看别人。）

40065011.English_Text: I found it, Sohyup.\nI found him!

40065012.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>진림</>도 구하고, 둘의 사이도\n좋아진 것 같아 다행이야)
40065012.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jinrim</> also found it, and I'm glad that the two seem to have gotten better)
40065012.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jinrim</> 也找到了，很高兴两人似乎变好了)

40065014.English_Text: (It disappeared in an instant...\nbut you have to keep on chasing and drying it!)
40065014.Chinese_Text: （瞬间就消失了……\n但是你还要继续追赶它！）

40065016.English_Text: (This is a sign of battle... \nreally meant to go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>depth</>\n!)
40065016.Chinese_Text: （这是战斗的标志......\n真的是为了去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>深度</>\n！）

40065020.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 그들을\n발견하기 전에,\n우리가 먼저 찾아야 합니다. 소협!
40065020.English_Text: Before the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</> can find them, we must find them first.
40065020.Chinese_Text: 在 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blackdawn</> 找到它们之前，我们必须先找到它们。

40065021.Original_Text: 아니, 저 곳에 \n떨어져 있는 건 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의...\n행방을 찾은 것 같습니다. 소협!
40065021.English_Text: No, \n that is away from there, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> seems to have found the whereabouts of \n. Sohyeop!
40065021.Chinese_Text: 不，\n那个不在那里，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> 似乎找到了\n的下落。Sohyeop！

40065022.English_Text: As expected, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> is crowded. We must defeat them first!
40065022.Chinese_Text: 不出所料，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>人满为患。我们必须先打败他们！

40065023.English_Text: The minions of the arrogant <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> will be the manure for the second coming of the great <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>
40065023.Chinese_Text: 傲慢的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的爪牙将成为伟大的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>苏拉的第二次降临的肥料。

40065025.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>'s division also seems to have healed, I'm glad...)
40065025.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的分裂似乎也痊愈了，我很高兴……)

40065027.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>To get to the post</>, it's safer to go over \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Predator's Hills</>.
40065027.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>为了到达岗位</>，越过\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Predator's Hills</>比较安全。

40065028.English_Text: Wah Sohyeop's martial arts \n are really amazing!
40065028.Chinese_Text: 华素赫的武功\n真是太厉害了！

40065029.English_Text: A lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Monsters</> have all disappeared!

40065030.English_Text: (I wish I could find a friend...)

40065031.English_Text: (If you were kidnapped \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>I was taken to a concentration camp</>...)
40065031.Chinese_Text: （如果你被绑架了\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>我被带到集中营</>...）

40065033.English_Text: Aww... <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>I want to go back to shelter</>...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Clean</>...

40065035.English_Text: I'll quickly go to where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Cheongwoon</> is!\nThank you! Sohyeop!

40065036.English_Text: (I'm glad the two of you met again...)

40065053.Original_Text: 동료들과 뿔뿔이 흩어지다니.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 새로운 바람을 일으킬\n이 몸의 위기로군.
40065053.English_Text: You are scattered with your colleagues. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> This is a body crisis that will cause a new wind.
40065053.Chinese_Text: 你和你的同事散了。\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>这是一场身体危机，将掀起新的风。

40065037.English_Text: Jinrim of the foster care team

40065058.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Would you like to explore more camps</>)

40065060.Original_Text: (이 근방에 붙잡힌 아이는 없는 듯 해)
40065060.English_Text: (No child seems to have been caught in this area)
40065060.Chinese_Text: （这个区域好像没有抓到小孩）

40065061.English_Text: (Find the other side, and if there is no \n, I'll have to pay another number)
40065061.Chinese_Text: （找对方，如果没有\n，我就得另付号码了）

40070027.Original_Text: 이런 무도한 놈들!\n죽어라 내... 내 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>연인의 원수</>!
40070027.Chinese_Text: 去死吧，我的……我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>情人的敌人</>！

40070028.Chinese_Text: （我之前不是说过<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>母亲的敌人</>吗？可疑）

40070029.English_Text: (A little while ago, I couldn't hear \n's voice from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jeeon Je-ha</>... \nWhere did you go?)
40070029.Chinese_Text: （不久前，我听不到 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jeeon Je-ha</> 的\n的声音......\n你去哪里了？）

40070030.English_Text: (No matter how much I search, I can't find \n of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jeeon Je-ha</>. \nAre you back?)
40070030.Chinese_Text: （无论我搜索多少，都找不到\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jeeon Je-ha</>。\n你回来了吗？）

40070031.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>我会试着找到\nJeunjae</>他消失的地方)

40070032.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn </>'s words, \nsummary, the traitor is \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The tainted crater</>
40070032.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>的话，\nsummary，叛徒是\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被污染的陨石坑</

40070034.English_Text: (Is that person over there... someone caught?)
40070034.Chinese_Text: （那边那个人……是不是被抓到了？）

40070035.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You tried to negotiate with the location of shelter</>...
40070035.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>你试图与避难所的位置协商</>...

40070096.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>I'll have to look \n while breaking through the guards of the Black Dawn</>)
40070096.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>冲破黑色黎明的守卫时我得看\n</>)
